titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation declaring that the proceedings of His Maiesties ecclesiasticall courts and ministers, are according to the lawes of the realme.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... Lyndhurst, the eighteenth day of August, in the thirteenth yeare of His Maiesties reigne.
Arms 24; Steele notation: pub- opinion 2) conside- to.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
